devdoc.details: Contract is responsible for managing mAsset and bAsset. Used for minting and burning tokens, calculating fees and calling the bridge if transaction based on token from another blockchain.

onTokensMintedCalled(address,uint256,add.details: Emitted when onTokensMinted method is called by the bridge.

params.orderAmount: Units of the masset to redeem.
params.tokenAddress: Address of the bAsset to redeem.
params.userData: Address of the final recipient as ABI encoded bytes.

onTokensReceivedCalled(address,address,a.details: Emitted when tokensReceived method is called by the bridge.

params.amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer.
params.operatorData: Bytes extra information provided by the operator (if any).
params.userData: Bytes extra information provided by the token holder (if any).

getProxyImplementation().details: get the implementation logic address referring to ERC1967 standard.

params._registerAsERC777RecipientFlag: Bool determine if contract should be register as ERC777 recipient.

mint(address,uint256).details: Mint a single mAsset, at a 1:1 ratio with the bAsset. This contract      must have approval to spend the senders bAsset.

mintTo(address,uint256,address).details: Mint a single mAsset to recipient address, at a 1:1 ratio with the bAsset.      This contract must have approval to spend the senders bAsset.

params._recipient: Receipient of the newly minted mAsset tokens.

onTokensMinted(uint256,address,bytes).details: This is called by the bridge to let us know the user has sent tokens through it and      into the mAsset.

params._orderAmount: Units of the mAsset to redeem.
params._tokenAddress: Address of the bAsset to redeem.
params._userData: Address of the final recipient as ABI encoded bytes.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeem(address,uint256).details: Credits the sender with a certain quantity of selected bAsset, in exchange for burning the      relative mAsset quantity from the sender. Sender also incurs a small mAsset fee, if any.

params._bAsset: Address of the bAsset to redeem.
params._massetQuantity: Units of the masset to redeem.

returns.massetRedeemed: Relative number of mAsset units burned to pay for the bAssets.

redeemByBridge(address,uint256,address).details: Credits a recipient with a certain quantity of selected bAsset, in exchange for burning the      relative mAsset quantity from the sender. Sender also incurs a small fee, if any.      This function is designed to be called by the bridge in order to have diffrent fees.

params._basset: Address of the bAsset to redeem.
params._massetQuantity: Units of the mAsset to redeem.
params._recipient: Address to credit with withdrawn bAssets.

returns.massetRedeemed: Relative number of mAsset units burned to pay for the bAssets.

redeemTo(address,uint256,address).details: Credits a recipient with a certain quantity of selected bAsset, in exchange for burning the      relative mAsset quantity from the sender. Sender also incurs a small fee, if any.

params._bAsset: Address of the bAsset to redeem.
params._massetQuantity: Units of the masset to redeem.
params._recipient: Address to credit with withdrawn bAssets.

returns.massetRedeemed: Relative number of mAsset units burned to pay for the bAssets.

redeemToBridge(address,uint256,address).details: Credits a recipient with a certain quantity of selected bAsset, in exchange for burning the      relative mAsset quantity from the sender. Sender also incurs a small fee, if any.      This function is designed to also call the bridge in order to have the basset tokens sent to      another blockchain.

params._basset: Address of the bAsset to redeem.
params._massetQuantity: Units of the mAsset to redeem.
params._recipient: Address to credit with withdrawn bAssets.

returns.massetRedeemed: Relative number of mAsset units burned to pay for the bAssets.

redeemToBridge(address,uint256,address,a.details: Credits a recipient with a certain quantity of selected bAsset, in exchange for burning the      relative mAsset quantity from the sender. Sender also incurs a small fee, if any.      This function is designed to also call the bridge in order to have the basset tokens sent to      another blockchain.

params._basset: Address of the bAsset to redeem.
params._bridgeAddress: This is ignored and is left here for backward compatibility with the FE.
params._massetQuantity: Units of the mAsset to redeem.
params._recipient: Address to credit with withdrawn bAssets.

returns.massetRedeemed: Relative number of mAsset units burned to pay for the bAssets.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

tokensReceived(address,address,address,u.details: This is called by the bridge to let us know tokens have been received.

params._amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer.
params._operatorData: Bytes extra information provided by the operator (if any).
params._userData: Bytes extra information provided by the token holder (if any).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: MassetManager
